_header: Constraint of pain thought and heaviness
_description: His hard-hearted mistress by Charles d’Orléans — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
COnstraynt of payne þouȝt & hevynesAy to pursewe the sewt
                    of my servise…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…As with yowre word sumwhat comfortith meThat y may fynde yow
                    softer then a stoon
